experience.summary: Working as a Java Full Stack Developer intern, focusing on developing and maintaining web applications using Spring Boot, Hibernate, and Angular. Collaborated with senior developers to design efficient back-end services and improve front-end performance.
keyResponsibilities: Developed RESTful APIs using Spring Boot for back-end services
Integrated Angular for responsive front-end development
Implemented security features using Spring Security
Worked with MySQL databases to manage and query data
Collaborated with the team on project deployment and bug fixes

experience.summary: Worked on various web development projects, building front-end components using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Assisted in developing MERN stack applications for clients and gained exposure to Node.js, React, and MongoDB.
keyResponsibilities: Built responsive and interactive user interfaces using React.js
Integrated back-end APIs with front-end applications
Developed role-based authentication and authorization using JWT
Collaborated with cross-functional teams for requirement analysis
Worked on payment integration using Stripe and order management

experience.summary: Completed a technical training program focusing on Java, Hibernate, Spring Boot, and web development. Gained practical experience in developing full-stack applications and working with databases.
keyResponsibilities: Learned and implemented Java and Hibernate in project environments
Worked on basic Spring Boot applications for data management
Collaborated with peers on team-based coding projects
Attended workshops on best practices in software development
